trans-unit.source: The URL of this page can be read using the simple token ##notifier_list_link## and is intended to redirect to a page with real estate.
Enter a page here that contains an Exposé module to be able to call up found objects directly from the e-mail.

Define here the page where the module for deleting notifications (Delete saved searches) is located. Please note that this page should never be protected. A saved search should be able to be deleted without logging in.
Define here the maximum number of objects that will be sent to interested parties by e-mail.
Disables the poor-man cronjob and enables the setup of a server-side cronjob which can be called via "/property_notifier/cron".
